title: RADS Error
body: I woke up this morning and tried to open up League and I got a RADS Error saying "Could not connect to HTTP server. Please check that your Internet connection is enable and that your firewall is not blocking access". I have already tried downloaded a new rads_user_kernel (From this website http://www.mediafire.com/download/c22774vp99r9ew2/rads_user_kernel.exe) but that hasn't seemed to work. Any ideas?

replies.body:
nothing is going to fix it. its on riots end and they refuse to admit to it and fix it. 

must be too early for them to worry about fixing anything. let them eat their donuts and drink their coffee and waste another few hours screwing around and they might look at the support boards and notice something is wrong. then hopefully tomorrow we will have a solution.
riot doesn't believe there is an issue they flat out responded to someone else who has reported the same issue saying it his connection and has nothing to do with their servers

I have the same problem, i was playing 1 night,  decided to play another game for a couple hours then around 4:00 AM i tried to play league and i got the Rads error message, me, my lil bro, and lil sis all 3 of us have that message and cant play like.

i tried uninstalling everything, but when i came to this website to redownload it, the "download the game" button doesnt work (like really) then i went to the support button, also didnt work, neither of the pages would load but everything else will.... like wtf...

Hey **Meskin12**,

Please try the solutions provided in the following thread: 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Y4AbLx62-solution-rads-error-dns-problem-cant-access-riot-games-website-windows-xp78-macos
getting the same thing...was fine last night before I went to bed cmon riot...I was watching the lck and ppl where ssaying they had problems in euw too so its not just us its you........

If LoL still doesn't work (like me) then just wait until you get a new computer and try downloading the game again... I know it sounds weird and stuff but unless Riot actually tries to fix this error it won't get fixed in a while. I really liked playing LoL as well but you have to deal with it. Heres a link to one of my threads on this error... http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/AAwEEN67-http-error-riot-please-read Lets start a war!
I don't get it , Me and my Girlfriend woke up this morning and BOTH have that same issue , We need some Love and Help Riot Games!
Same issue, I have the firewall disabled. . . Never had an issue before, come on Riot.
i don't get the error anymore but now it just hangs on the log in screen.

RADS Error: Could not connect to the HTTP Server. Please help with this ! 
I have no firewall, grrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr.... this is soooo frustrating !!!

I got the same error message this morning
still wont work
I am having the same issue.

Were all having the same issue.  Im sure theyre aware, look at the message boards.  Dont get so angry at a free game that works 99% of the time.  If it doesnt work 99% of the time, then yes, it is you.  Replace your walmart router.
